means.word_mean: 1. a Valkyrie or a queen in the Nibelungenlied who loved the hero Siegfried; when he deceived her she had him killed and then committed suicide

auth_sentence.content: Brunnhilde is Wotan's daughter, fathered with Erda, the all-knowing Earth Goddess.
auth_sentence.res_content: Brunnhilde is Wotan's daughter, fathered with Erda, the all-knowing Earth Goddess.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Brunnhilde is Wotan's daughter, fathered with Erda, the all-knowing Earth Goddess.

auth_sentence.content: With Brunnhilde gone, Wotan is confronted by Fricka, his wife, who is also the Goddess of Marriage.
auth_sentence.res_content: With Brunnhilde gone, Wotan is confronted by Fricka, his wife, who is also the Goddess of Marriage.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: With Brunnhilde gone, Wotan is confronted by Fricka, his wife, who is also the Goddess of Marriage.
